articles.title: Tottenham defender Cristian Romero joins up with Argentina despite being suspended
articles.description: Tottenham defender Cristian Romero today joined up with the Argentina squad despite being banned for both of this month’s World Cup qualifiers.
articles.content:
T ottenham defender Cristian Romero today joined up with the Argentina squad despite being banned for both of this month’s World Cup qualifiers.

articles.title: Alleged gang rape in Argentina fuels calls for men to fight gender violence
articles.description: Daylight attack heightens concern over how sexual assault is seen as isolated incidents rather than systemic problem
articles.content:
An alleged gang rape in broad daylight has shone a harsh spotlight on the pervasiveness of rape culture in Argentina and prompted fresh calls for men to play a bigger role in the country’s battle against gender violence.

articles.description: Doja Cat recently stopped her set at Lollapalooza Argentina when she noticed an audience member in distress.

articles.description: Doja Cat stopped her performance at Lollapalooza Argentina to help a fan in the crowd. Doja Cat took several minutes to help a fan during her set at Lollapal...
articles.content:
Doja Cat took several minutes to help a fan during her set at Lollapalooza Argentina on Saturday night. After making sure they were alright, Doja spoke about the importance of safety at concerts.

articles.title: Lollapalooza Argentina: Doja Cat Stops Performance to Help Fan
articles.description: Doja Cat stopped her set at Lollapalooza Argentina for nearly five minutes when she noticed an audience member in distress.
articles.content:

articles.title: Former Pumas star Aramburu killed in Paris
articles.description: Former Argentina rugby international Federico Aramburu has been shot and killed in Paris after an altercation in a bar.
articles.content:
Former Argentina rugby player Federico Martin Aramburu has been killed in Paris early on Saturday, he was 42.
The Paris prosecutor's office confirmed to the Associated Press that a murder investigation has been opened.
